HIGHWAYS AND MINOR PORTS DEPARTMENT
ADU
ACQUISITION OF LANDS
[G.O. (D) No. 71, Highways and Minor Ports (EAP1) 21st March 2020, பங்குனி 8, விகாரி, திருவள்ளுவர் ஆண்டு-2051.)
No. II(2)/HWMP/216(d-1)/2020.
The Governor of Tamil Nadu having been satisfied that the lands specified in the Schedule below have to be acquired for the Highways for formation of two laning extension of Thuraiyur-Perambalur Road (SH-142) from Km 30/250 to 32/057 Km V.No.10 Aranarai (South) Village, in Perambalur Taluk, Perambalur District and it has already been decided that the entire amount of compensation to be awarded for the lands is to be paid out of the funds controlled or managed by the Divisional Engineer (H), Chennai - Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Salem after considering the cause shown by the owner (or) other person having interest on such lands as
Part II-Section 2
Notifications or Orders of interest to a Section of the public issued by Secretariat Departments.

the case may be do hereby publish the following notice under sub-section (1) of Section 15 of the Tamil Nadu Highways Act, 2001 (Tamil Nadu Act 34 of 2002).
NOTICE
THE SCHEDULE
9/6B7B
Under sub-section (1) of Section 15 of the Tamil Nadu Highways Act, 2001 (Tamil Nadu Act 34 of 2002), the Governor of Tamil Nadu hereby acquires the land specified in the Schedule below measuring to an extent of 1286 sq.mts of dry lands in V.No. 10 Aranarai (South) Village in Perambalur Taluk, Perambalur District for the formation of two laning extension of Thuraiyur-Permbalur Road (SH-142) from Km 30/250 to 32/057 Km.
The plan of the lands is kept in the Office of the Special District Revenue Officer (L.A) Chennai-Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Salem and Office of the Special Tahisildar (L.A) Chennai Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Perambalur may be inspected at any time during the office hours.
